entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 9:06AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...TRACE ASHFALL POSSIBLE FOR UNIMAK ISLAND... As of 0900 AM this morning, satellite imagery and pilot reports indicate that an eruption is ongoing at Shishaldin Volcano. Ash is being lofted to the east-southeast, which may lead to trace amounts of ashfall downwind of the volcano, including False Pass. This statement will be updated if conditions change.
